Uses of Class
org.jcvi.jillion.sam.SamFileWriterBuilder

  • Packages that use SamFileWriterBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam
    This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data.

    • Uses of SamFileWriterBuilder in org.jcvi.jillion.sam

      Methods in org.jcvi.jillion.sam that return SamFileWriterBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.createBamIndex(boolean createBamIndex)
      Should a corresponding BAM Index file also be created (false by default).
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.createBamIndex(boolean createBamIndex, boolean includeMetadata)
      Should a corresponding BAM Index file also be created (false by default).
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.forceHeaderSortOrder(SortOrder sortOrder)
      Change the sort order specified in the written out header but do not actually re-sort the records on the fly.
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.reSortBy(SortOrder sortOrder)
      Convenience method to resort using the default number of records to get in memory specified by getDefaultRecordsToKeepInMemory().
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.reSortBy(SortOrder sortOrder, int maxRecordsToKeepInMemory)
      Resort the SamRecords written by this writer on the fly.
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.setSamAttributeValidator(SamAttributeValidator validator)
      Set a SamAttributeValidator to use to confirm that the SamRecords given to the writer are valid for this SamHeader.
      SamFileWriterBuilder SamFileWriterBuilder.setTempRootDir(File tmpDir)
      Change the temp directory to write re-sorted temp data to when writing out the SAM or BAM file.
